website_summaries.verdict: This plush shag rug comes in rich, saturated jewel colors and neutrals, and it’s quite affordable.
pros: A good vacuuming fluffs out this lush area rug after it’s delivered and unrolled
Vacuums well without much, if any, shedding
Also available in matching rounds and runners
cons: Robotic vacuums have a tough time navigating this rug
It’s a bit thinner than you might expect

customer_reviews.title: Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rug for my baby's room. My 4 year old sometimes likes to sleep in the baby's room in a sleeping bag on the floor. First night sleeping on this rug he developed a rash. Second night, more rash. Third night, bloody nose and swollen eyes. He had little bite marks all over him. This thing was infested with i'm guessing dust mites or some little bug. Every time I touched the rug afterwards, I felt like little bugs were crawling on me. Couldn't see any of them though. Once I stopped my son from sleeping on the rug in his sleeping bag, the rash/bites went away. Totally disgusted and will not buy from this supplier ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Cotoia

customer_reviews.title: The color is so dull it does not match the colors in her room ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this item has so many high reviews. When I received it, it didn't match the color in the picture. And it was not soft at all. This was meant for my daughter's nursery. The color is so dull it does not match the colors in her room and the coarse shag carpet is not what I wanted. I am returning, I warn you not to buy this. I've attached pictures of the color I thought I was getting and the actual rug I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D. Cepeda

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, you can’t beat the price on this rug. My husband bought this for us a couple months back and it fits in well with our living room. When you first get it, you’re going to have the edges sticking up but no worries because all you have to do is place something heavy on the corners and leave it for about 20-30 minutes and Ta Da, problem solved. I also vacuum this every so often and it seems to still be in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: The rug far exceeded our expectations. It is plusher and softer than the rug we are replacing which was from Ikea. My only complaint is the initial odor. I recommend airing it out a few days before putting it into your house.
customer_reviews.author: Koi Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shag. Not too high, not too low. Got the Cloud Grey & it is perfect. GREYT rug for the price! Unrolled beautifully & isn't shedding. Best thing is my greyhound thinks it's her new dog bed!
customer_reviews.author: vee gee

customer_reviews.title: I loved this carpet so much I bought another one the ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this carpet so much I bought another one the next day. One for under my king size bed and the other for my living room. Size 8X11 Snowwhite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the price. When I unrolled it, it immediately later flat. No crazy odor, perfect color. Not as soft as I was hoping it would be. I’m using it on a tile floor, and I will have to add something underneath to keep it from sliding. Over I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible smell!! Rug had a strong vinegar smell. I have been trying to air it out for 5 days but I think I will have to return it. It is also not soft or plush. Edit!! Tried to return and was given a run around. Wanted to repurchase but could not be guaranteed replacement would not smell too. What kind of customer service is this! Seriously am not happy with Amazons customer service any longer
customer_reviews.author: Cooperc2

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this rug! I ordered the 10’x12’ dark grey rug and it is gorgeous! It is more lush/piles than I expected and feels so nice on bare feet. The delivery was on time (within a 2 hour window) and they brought it inside the house but did not open it (which I didn’t expect). It was packaged nicely/safely wrapped in clear plastic and then another tarp layer more durable for the weather and potential shipping damage. I would not hesitate buying this rug again, great value and quality! The only issue is it’s so high pile that our roomba like vacuum can’t navigate it so well!
customer_reviews.author: E. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Is it fancy and luxurious? Not quite. But for a synthetic rug, it ain't bad. It's soft and thick, the color is rich and exactly as promised, and for the price, it's fabulous. The only downside is that our cat absolutely refuses to go near it for some reason. We've tried to introduce her to this rug but she insists on going ALL THE WAY AROUND it, totally out of her way, just to avoid stepping on it. So I guess the cat would give it fewer stars, but she's a freeloader so her opinion doesn't really count.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Flea

customer_reviews.title: This is coarse long strands not soft like I thought I was getting
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and assumed this would be a soft rug. This is coarse long strands not soft like I thought I was getting. I looked for a long time at other options too...disappointment I bought this. you can also see colored threads through the top of the rug that are used to hold it together that are bright orange.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! The color is true to advertised, easy to vacuum, and soft.
customer_reviews.author: CRG

customer_reviews.title: Good rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall the rug is good for the price! Purchased for bedroom just to breakup all of the wood flooring, and on a tight budget.. It’s definitely a very synthetic material, but is soft. Very true to color, but was slightly thrown off by the very dark colored backing. This shows through when the shag fibers are shifted and bare spots show through.. they definitely should use a white or light colored backing.. I’m pleased with the rug but would not put in a high traffic area, it definitely would not hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: sarah morris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 8x10 rug to cover my entire living room for my baby to crawl on it, but it's too rough for her skin. If this is your intention, don't buy it. I'm returning it, the quality isn't that great, and there are other options at Amazon a little bit more expensive but that are totally worth it in a long term. I ordered samples of another one and didn't think twice to return this one and buy the other. Maybe for other purposes it would work, but I don't recommend if you're looking for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: mgovea_8

customer_reviews.title: Haters on here lol
customer_reviews.text: After ready as many reviews as I could before my eyesight started to blur lol i decided to just try it. They're super affordable so okay whatever right.... 1. There is no smell 2. They are much softer and thicker than i anticipated and idk what every else problem is there lol 3. They lay flat 4. Color is awesome. Just as shown 5. Arrived a day early I'm in love with these. The ONLY reason I gave it 4 out of 5 and not 5 out of 5 is because they are slightly uneven. But that very well could be that it needs to be stretched or used more. Doesnt bother me that much at all.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and smell
customer_reviews.text: This is just terrible! The quality is awful. I ordered a similar rag from Overstock and wanted a smaller size from Amazon for my toddler room but this is nothing like the other item. And it smells so so bad - I would never ever put it in my kid's room. It smells like gas mixed with some chemicals. And it is super thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Looks alot better in person. Fits nicely under my 6 chair table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll be back
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this product before ordering and, quite frankly, thought that I would use it and throw it away for the price. I have bought shag rugs for triple the price that were not as nice as this one. Nice, thick, high shag. Color slightly darker than photos but completely acceptable. It took a day or two to "uncurl" with weight on the corners, but that is expected and it is just gorgeous and luxuriously soft. I will be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly inexpensive. Color is great. No complaints. Looks good. It is YELLOW.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It is a bit thin but hey you ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is a bit thin but hey you buy another 9x12 rug for under $500 and see what you get. The ends were what i was worried about but they are nicely sewed and seem strong. I havent had any curling of the ends like other reviews. I would however probly stay away from the light colors- I get the charcoal and if you run your hand through you do see some of the black coming through. Could be more of an issue with a lighter rug. It is comfortable to sit on but could be better with a foam mat under it. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: J Hess

customer_reviews.title: You can find better!
customer_reviews.text: The carpet is pretty small, but I love the color since it was essentially what I wanted. The rug is not soft at all. It feels like and basic carpet that you’d find in an apartment. From prior experience with this material, I know that it will not be easy to clean or stain resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dull yellowish ivory
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I will be processing a return. It would have made sense to tag the rug color as white but you had to be extra and added “snow” in the description. The rug is nowhere near white talk less of snow white, it’s more of a dull yellowish ivory. I was going to settle because of the return hassle but the rug looks tacky. Apart from the color fail, the shag is nonexistent and you can see the black threads showing through. I have cheaper rugs that look better than this. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Issey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This rug fits perfectly in the guest bedroom. The lighting brings out the rug which also match the drapes I have up now.
customer_reviews.author: LéilaF

customer_reviews.title: Sheds, thin, has an order that doesn't go away AND gives a rash :(!
customer_reviews.text: Itchy itchy itchy. I broke out in a rash and I gave it a long time trial period after I bought it. Like I tried it out until the very last day I could return it. I was coughing sneezing wheezing and I every time​ I sat on it, my legs were horribly itchy and I developed a rash. I had to return it. My parents begged me to :(
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad for a cheaper rug
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad for a cheaper rug. I got the 8x10 for my living room. Definitely a bright white which I wanted. Smell isn’t bad at all. It’s noticable, but I sprinkled it with baking soda and let it sit for awhile before vacuuming it up and most of the smell went away. Comfortable on the feet, too! Only small drawback is there could be more “filling.” You see some darker spots mixed in the rug, but you do get what you paid for. It’ll go great with all my furniture once I’m moved in. Dog finds it comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Lockerpunch

customer_reviews.title: Green
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as soft as I was hoping for but it made a little girl happy. There is a smell (just opened it). So will have the windows open for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Endija Reid

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is okay. It is not very soft and it could be thicker. When you rub your hand against it, you can see through to the bottom. It's an okay rug with an excellent price but ultimately I am returning and have purchased something that is a little more expensive and of nicer quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frtjth124

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it's made of dollar store yarn
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all the wonderful reviews are about. This rug feels like you bought the cheapest yarn ever made and made a shag rug out of it. It is absolutely awful. The best I can say about it is the color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Thin, hard, not plush. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure where the 5 star reviews are coming from but I feel like I just wasted $60 on this rug. Got a grey 5 x 7 for my son’s room. I have another shag rug I bought from amazon (different rug) in my living room and have been nothing but impressed by its super soft feel underfoot. This rug: it is hard. Looks and feels as if it’s been subject to heavy traffic for about 10-20 years. I even heavily vacuumed it to fluff it up. While it looks better, it’s still really hard. I do NOT recommend this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Mildew
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 4x6 pure ivory rug, it reeks of mildew. I have bought several rugs over the years, and the smell is not the normal chemical smell of a new rug.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: So, I've had this rug a few months now and I'm ready to throw it in the trash. It came all folded up so there's creases that are still visible no matter how tight we pulled. This rug HOLDS dirt. I have a dyson animal ball and it does so well on all my other rugs but 3 passes over this piece of junk and there's hardly anything in the tank. It's so disgusting how you can feel the dirt trapped in it while you walk across it. DONT BUY IF YOU LIVE IN YOUR HOUSE.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Shaggalicious
customer_reviews.text: It's very plush. In comparison to same size Walmart shag rug we just bought for $40 in the same size, this rug is alot thicker and "shaggier" so I would say it's worth the extra $20. I would like to buy another in a different color but they cost more for some reason :(
customer_reviews.author: ANON

customer_reviews.title: Rug gathers-think before you leap
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this rug as the color grey was what I was looking for. Not so plush but has just the right fluff to it. However it’s been almost a year since my purchase and I could Never get the rug to stay in a straighten position. It constantly gathers. I trip over it all the time. Maybe I received a manufacturing lemon-i don’t know. One thing I do know is that I’ll never purchase another. Total waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: LaFran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rug!
customer_reviews.text: This took an additional week to ship, which I wasn't happy about. But once it did arrive, I LOVE IT! It had no smell, was easy to roll out, and the corners layed flat within a few hours. I love the feel of this rug, it is so soft on my feet. Feels very "rich" or decadent, love it! The color I choose was the Taupe, and it's a perfect neutral, not too yellow or brown. It looks amazing in the living room. Also, my dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Stinky bath mat; inaccurate measurement.
customer_reviews.text: SOLO COLLECTION: This carpet is more like a cheap bath mat. It is not full, plush, or soft. It's a long shag (longer than description), feels coarse, and crusty. It stinks and has a heavy chemical smell, so overall it really is just a giant bath mat you'd find at WalMart or some disgusting low end knock off store. I don't even think my cat would throw up on this. Top make it even worse, it's not the correct measurement given (2inches short as seen in pic) You get what you pay for, definitely returning and going for the rug that is $200+
customer_reviews.author: MISS V

customer_reviews.title: A sapphire blue and NOT navy blue rug
customer_reviews.text: I was shipped an inaccurate product. I ordered a navy blue rug per the description, and they shipped me a sapphire rug. The company knowingly labeled the description of this product"navy", when they shipped a sapphire rug. Two completely different colors when it is rolled out. The manufacturer deems navy and sapphire to be the same. Sapphire is not the same as navy blue. Please review the pictures and let me know if this is the same rug. It is not the same rug, it is a light sapphire blue rug. Quality of the rug is not the same as the video either. It is much thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Genette

customer_reviews.title: We really wanted to like the rug
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like the rug. It looks pretty nice, but it is NOT plush and not soft at all. It felt like walking on cheap yarn and had a sticky, oily film on it that made our feet and hands feel dirty. When we vacuumed it out the first time it did look pretty decent, but the feel was so bad that we had to return it. Maybe we expected too much from a $75 rug. I probably would have given it 3 or maybe 4 stars if not for the sticky/oily feel. It's possible that we just got unlucky with ours. Suffice it to say we are going with a different rug.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Read me if considering the green shag...
customer_reviews.text: Okay the plastic wrapping on the rug was torn open upon delivery so the edges were a bit dirty but from what I could tell it did seem soft and plush as other reviewer's described. NOW IF YOU ARE BUYING THIS IN GREEN - it is not grass green as some other reviewer described - it is more like any of the following: Skittle green Kermit the Frog green Iceberg lettuce green Get the picture? It is a lighter, not quite neon, definitely not grass green..unless we're talking about smokable "grass" in which case yes, maybe that color green depending on the variety.
customer_reviews.author: By  MC

customer_reviews.title: Color and size
customer_reviews.text: Got this rug and it came today for my daugther room and I must say the reviews were spot on accurate. I purchased the lavendar 8x10 or so I thought. It covers about 80% of her room but when I actually measured the rug it turned out to be 7x10 😒. The color is definitely off, it's not a bright lavender as advertised but just like everyone says, it's cool for the price🤷🏽‍♀️. We gave it a quick vaccum to fluff it out and thats it. Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Ravens Girl

customer_reviews.title: Area rugs
customer_reviews.text: We just had new hardwood floors put in throughout the house and needed some rugs. Terracotta is not usually a color I like but with out futon cover that has almost the same color in the pattern it looks great. I will considered additional purchases in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wyatt-Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Not soft or plush at ALL
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these rugs to sit next to the bed during the winter time when floors get cold. The rug feels absolutely awful, it is not soft or plush at all. It feels completely synthetic and I would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Barblin Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine, feels cheap. Wait for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The good: I ordered the Taupe color. It’s a great color that would work with both warm and cool tones. The rug looks nice. The bad: Two days after I bought the 7x10 for $130, it was available for $99 and there is no way to ask for a price match. The polypropylene material it is made from feels cheap. I planned to use it in our main living area so children have a soft place to play, but I’ll end up moving it to a lesser used area because it’s not soft enough. It definitely needs a pad underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It's not soft, but it looks ok.
customer_reviews.text: I got this expecting a plush rug, as described. It is not soft. It's thin strands loosely woven on a thin backing. But I will say, for the lack of comfort, it still looks ok. I just needed it to cover some worn carpet in a high traffic area. This does the job. It even looks like it's gonna be plush, despite not being. The grey seems to look fine, although I'd be concerned about seeing the backing through it if you got a dark color. Overall, it will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Great area rug for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quick (2 Days)-even though it said it was on backorder. The size is perfect, it layed out flat, no weird smell and soft to touch. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karmen

customer_reviews.title: Will not lay flat
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Unique Loom shag purchase- the first was 6x9 and served its purpose well the two years I had it. Ordered 9x12 navy this time and the rug was received folded in half and then rolled. I've purchased many rugs in the past and have never received a rug folded that way before being rolled- it seems to have disfigured the lay of the rug. Despite having been laid out for 1 week, the rug will not lay flat and is extremely wrinkled/looks sloppy. Will likely be returning- would recommend avoiding this seller for large rug purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ish

customer_reviews.title: Bruh
customer_reviews.text: Looks like grass, so cute, my bedroom is a damn spring wonderland with this in it.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My girls picked this out for the bedroom, and I am pretty disappointed in it. It may be a shag rug, but it is not soft at all. There are also lots of spots where you can see through to the dark brown backing. I just got this today, so I can't say how easy it is to clean. It also has a faint smell, lots of bumps and creases, and it slides all around the floor. Those are all things that could probably be fixed over time. I would return this if my daughters weren't so excited to have it. It's a very bright yellow. That's what my girls wanted, but FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: this rug is sticky and will never dry! There’s nothing that helps it. It gets all our other floors sticky. It’s gross. My prior positive review was done too early! Don’t buy!! For the price, this rug does the job. It looks great in my space. It did have a bit of a mildew smell at first but after vacuuming and a bit of fabric refresher it’s fine now. I just wish the rug fibers were softer to the touch. Overall though, happy w my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the rug, particularly for the price of $135.00 for a larger area rug. Seems well made and have been using it for a few weeks. No loss of fiber, etc. My only concern, and it's minor, is the edges do not lay flat. I've placed heavy objects to allow it time to "settle", but after several weeks the edges still curl up. The backing needs to be more substantial and heavier to weight the edges down.
customer_reviews.author: KC Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12 x 15 rug and I’m pretty happy with the overall quality and color. Unlike many rugs this one rolled out and unfolded without creases and was relatively flat right away. A very big plus. It smelled of new carpet for about a day and then dissipated quickly. The overall softness is good and the color was exactly as pictured. The only con is that an inch and a half of the binding was unraveled when I opened the rug. Luckily it was near a corner so I just put that in the corner of the room. I wasn’t about to try to send this beast back. Very happy with this rug.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I give credit where it's due. Spent thousands of $s on Amazon over the years with the assurance that if I didn't like it, it could be returned. Not this time! No mention of that in their ad that I could find before or after buying it. The color is pretty but it IS NOT SOFT or even near it. Now I am stuck with it. If you are like me and like curling your toes in a SOFT shag this isn't the rug for you. Beware before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Truly awful rug.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this raggedy, cheaply made rug. It will not lie flat, no matter what I do, it SMELLS FUNNY, and it's so slippery on the bottom that, if you use it on hard floors without taping it down, you're going to ice skate across the room, and into a wall. It's also made from a cheap, coarse yarn, with a weirdly sticky feel to it. Wish I'd spent a little more on a better quality rug.
customer_reviews.author: Nichols71

customer_reviews.title: Cloud gray darker than in photos
customer_reviews.text: Ordered “cloud gray” color is way darker than in the photos advertised...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's "OK" , I'm not particularly impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It's "OK" , I'm not particularly impressed with the quality of the shag or the basic cush on these rugs. It's nothing like the Savafieh rugs I have bought on Amazon. We ended up putting a smaller runner on top of this rug and we use this rug as an "accent layer". It sounds odd but it works. The rug by itself, visually and aesthetically, is not attractive enough to stand on it's own in our opinion. For those of you contemplating putting this on a hardwood floor: There is no anti-slip rubber backing on this rug. Note: In it's defense the backing / underlayer of the rug is a sturdy woven material (seems durable) and shipping was free.
customer_reviews.author: YeahSoMaybe?

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap, and that's very obvious.
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap for an 8x10, so I knew there was a risk it was going to be awful - but I figured it was worth it as I didn't have a huge budget for this room. It's the worst cheap shag I've ever bought (and I've bought a few other cheap ones) because it absolutely FEELS like plastic, it isn't plush, it just feels like you're stepping on fuzzy plastic. You can see the jute backing from the front because the pile isn't dense enough (there isn't enough strands per square inch to cover). I wouldn't buy this again, I paid $107 and I have bought other ones on amazon for less that were better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: I would like a refund on shipping charge
customer_reviews.text: I returned one rug, plan to return the other today but don't feel I should be charged for shipping, I clicked the wrong return reason on this- I meant "inaccurate website description" this is a pain to try and re-wrap to send back bulky heave, color is not "red" I realize reds come in shades as all colors do but I was matching to true red pillows and this rug is wine. I have it back in my car and wrapped as best I can and will return today. I would have preferred it rolled not folded. I would like a refund on my shipping charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndalou52

customer_reviews.title: Hard for babies
customer_reviews.text: I bought an 8x10 turquoise color. For the price it is a pretty cool rug. If you are buying a rug for your baby to play on it and not hurt his head if he falls, this is not it. It is pretty hard since it doesn’t have a lot of thread. I have attached a picture of the turquoise one I bought from here and a sample one (grey) I received. The grey is twice the price. You can see how much more thread it has and it adds more cushion. If you are buying just for “show” it is a great one for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like picture.  It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Measured the space before buying so we knew what size to get. This looks exactly like the picture and was the exact size it said t would be. After reading the reviews I decided to vaccum it immediately after receiving it, just in case. It vacuumed well. There was no smell or anything odd about it. Our dog peed on it and I used a dog pee product to get it out. It didnt leave a stain or smell and I checked the back of it and it did not go through. Overall , happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn214

customer_reviews.title: A big NO
customer_reviews.text: I have to return which is going to be a HUGE PAIN in the BUTT As I was unrolling my rug I noticed a 3 inch spot with NO carpet fibers!!!! Overall the carpet looks very cheaply made. Save your money spend the extra $40 and get an area rug that will last more than a month
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rug. I bought this because my more expensive rug was ruined and was not able to be steam cleaned. This was very close to what it looked like, but a quarter of the price. I have dogs, and I dogsit a lot of friends dogs. I've got a lot of friends over and this is the main rug. I've had this rug for a few months now and have waited to write a review. At first I wasn't super keen on it. It seemed very cheap and poor quality. But it has held up so well so far. Today was the first day I steam cleaned it and it came up beautiful. Definitely well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doggo123

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!! They leave needles in the rug!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We put this under our kind bed. It looked alright and o figured it would do the job. This morning and I was shuffling my feet across the rug after getting out of bed, a sewing needle went straight into my foot! I screamed and sat down. Pulled the large needle out of my foot and saw it still had white thread looped in. It must have been from manufacturing! Now I need to go get a tetanus shot but thank god my toddler wasn’t the one to find this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP! NOT SOFT! NOT FULL!
customer_reviews.text: *FALSE ADVERTISING* I’m starting to think most of these reviews are paid users or fake! The rug is NOT soft! It’s NOT full! It looks terribly cheap! AND you can see right through to the base! DO NOT BUY! Even if you do get an awesome deal save that money and put it towards a better quality rug!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis P.

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT navy blue!
customer_reviews.text: Well, dang!! Beware!! If you want NAVY! I wanted NAVY blue....this isn't!! Now I'm not sure how to proceed. Received it today.....opened it just now....NOT navy blue!! It's round....which I am pleased with. I think I'd be happy with it if it were navy blue.....don't know what color blue to call it but definitely not navy. I had planned to order another just like it in a different size.....And so difficult to return due to the size etc (I'm not a young person and would find it difficult to package and haul). Can't decide what to do now. Hate to keep something that is not what I thought I would be getting and not properly described!
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice rug...
customer_reviews.text: The rug arrived today and it looks really nice. The quality is decent. I liked it so much that I was going to order another one in the same size and color for a different room. When I went to order another one, the price of the 8 X 10 in terra-cotta increased from $105 to $142. I placed the original order only 5 days ago. How does a company justify increasing a price by nearly 50% in a matter of a few days? WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Bleu Lorax

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price, just not Incredibly Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this rug for the price! The color is perfect, the product came on time & I’ve just received it & laid it out & it’s almost flat already! My only complaint is I wish it was softer. The rug isn’t uncomfortable by any means, it’s just not as soft as I’d like. For the price I’d purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: steph79

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rug
customer_reviews.text: Wanted A red rug, and most stores charge over $100 for this size rug. The quality was better than I thought. And its larger than I thought. It is more of a crimson red, dark red. Not a crayon red. But its still pretty and soft. I added my red colored pillows so you can see the difference in the colors of red.
customer_reviews.author: Dimplezz

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but I've had it for a little over a month and it's falling apart! It's thinning out in several spots..we hardly even walk on it so I don't understand why. If I could go back, I'd buy something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: avoid this product! CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: yuck! this carpet is beyond cheap and beyond belief that a company would even bother making such a truly dreadful product! i’m shocked and disgusted. the spacing between the “shag” fibers is extreme, as in not dense. i bought the white carpet but it comes with a hideous black backing, however the fibers are so sparse that one can see more black than white! really, it’s disgraceful. the shag fibers themselves are very, very poor quality and very thin and soooooo cheap looking. i searched long and hard for this carpet and read all the reviews, it looks NOTHING AT ALL like the photos! bait and switch??? it’s a hideous carpet only fit for the rubbish bin.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Lovely rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: Finding a 10x13 rug at this price point was amazing. I received exactly what I was expecting. It is not plush and squishy. If you want that, then don't be cheap. This rug looks great. If it is for a cozy living space, opt for a nice rug pad underneath it. I chose RUGPADUSA from here on Amazon. No issues on shedding thus far, that's with kids & dogs running all over it. It also vacuums just fine. Other than the fact that it just lays there doing nothing, I am very happy with this purchase. Photo taken under warm lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS AREA RUG!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday and couldn't wait to get home to see it. I was not disappointed! The color is true to the sellers picture - my pic was taken at night with just lights on, so appears darker. I love everything about this rug. The pile, the color, the FEEL on your bare feet, the PRICE (was on sale for $48). It's so soft, and I tried a few barefoot dance moves on it and you can even DANCE on this thing! Which made me extra happy. I've not had a shag carpet in my home since the 1970s...this is so much fun in so many ways. When this one is past it's prime, I WILL be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, for $50 this is a great buy. I’ve been looking at discount stores in my area for some time. I wanted this for my sons playroom. It isn’t soft like a blanket but it’s not scratchy and it does not irritate bare skin. I have it on hardwood floors with no anti-slip mat under it and though it moves slightly over time it does not slip out from under you. As you can see from my photo it is a good shag length (see where the slide meets the carpet). This does not look cheap at all. I purchased two originally and will be purchasing a third. For this size, quality, and price it’s a really great find!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: $150 in the TRASH!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is horrible and absolutely would not lay flat after 10 days of walking on it and steaming the back. It was shipped folded in half, and wrapped and taped so tightly that there was no way to get the creases out. Way too big and bulky to try to ship back so I threw it out!!! Plus, it was a burgundy red and not “cherry” red. I am baffled at all the positive reviews, as I always do my homework before purchasing on line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loooooooooove this rug. EXACTLY what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it. You won’t regret it. I ordered pure ivory 8x10 ——the perfect off white but not cream!! It is super soft and I cannot seem to get up off it and go to work. Such a good deal for the unbelievably low price. You can easily pay double for another barely as great as this one. NOTE: I JUST unrolled it and fluffed it up a bit. Almost all wrinkles and corners are smoothed out and it has only been 10 minutes. Just lay something on the corners for a few minutes and the rug will be perfect. Super fast delivery and not too heavy to carry. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant, soft and big. Everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Seriously buy this. You will be very happy with your purchase. Just the right amount of thickness, nice and full, very soft and easy to vacuum. Easily forms to perfect flatness by just laying the rug the way you want it, about an hour or less later, it’s flat. I am using on tile floor and is not slipping anywhere while being played on by children
customer_reviews.author: MPLLC

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug for our living room. I have 5 kids, so I didn't want to invest in something expensive. This serves our needs perfectly for family movie night, lounging on the floor playing games, and it warms up the room nicely. There is a bit of a filmy feeling when it's new, but after a few vacuums, it goes away. It's not super thick, but the length of the fibers helps to compensate for that. I would definitely recommend for a household with kids.
customer_reviews.author: DTribeofFive

customer_reviews.title: its a nice rug, its not a great rug
customer_reviews.text: FIrst of all, i will say it was my second choice rug. I got amazoned and the price jumped way up on the rug i already picked out. SOOO I wanted super soft and shaggy rug, I got a shaggy rug that is a bit coarse and a bit uncomfortable to sit on with direct skin. It does LOOK really nice, and for the price - you are getting a good deal. I bought this big daddy for under my bed, and the matching runner for the vanity area of the master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: kstar

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy with this rug!
customer_reviews.text: I almost went with another rug after reading a few bad reviews, but I’m so glad I ended going with this one. I bought the navy blue and it’s a beautiful, rich color. It’s soft enough and is easy to vacuum! The last rug I bought was a lot more expensive, and was one of those super soft ones, but it was impossible to vacuum and ended up matted after a few years. I think this one will hold up for a lot longer and is easy to clean! Also, no weird smell or shedding upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: william rice

customer_reviews.title: Decent rug.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rug for my bedroom. I got the 4' x 6' and after reading the comments, I almost didn't buy but took my chances and I'm glad I did! It's soft, I cannot comment on stain resistance or cleaning ease as I haven't spilled anything on it nor have I had to use the vacuum on it yet. However, I do imagine running a vacuum won't be an easy task. It is a bit flimsy but given it's in my bedroom, no matter. It does look great, is soft on my feet and the color is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: jnangs

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much for the price I paid but wow...this rug is so nice. It even has a rubberized border on the bottom to keep it gripping the floor. Also, I have seen complaints about it arriving rolled up and when put down onto the floor, the edges turn up. I simply rolled it the opposite way and left it alone for an hour and when I rolled it onto the floor, it was flat and perfect. It is so luxurious too. So soft and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: acat10

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Even better price!
customer_reviews.text: This rug has been an amazing purchase for my living room. With 3 toddlers, 3 dogs, and 2 cats, I can safely say the rug holds up great! The color is accurate to the pictures. I've vacummed it several times and have not had any issues with shedding. It's not the softest rug ever, but definitely not uncomfortable. I've had this rug for several months and it's super easy to clean and doesn't show any stains so far. I actually bought a second one for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: Good price, not as soft as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as soft as I was hoping for. I don't know if I got the right rug because other reviews said it was so soft and I don't agree. The yarn is long but not full, and it's slightly scratchy. It will work in my son's room since he's just walking on it. But I was going to order the same one (different shade) for my daughter's room, but it's not soft enough. She sits and plays on her rug a lot and has some sensory issues so this will be too "scratchy" for her. It's a shame because it's affordable for a large size, and the color choices are nice.
customer_reviews.author: RI

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This rug was Perfect for my living room! I was worried the size would be too small, or that the color would be off but it exceeded all expectations. I got the right size and color. No odd smell and is soft. I will be buying others.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Soft & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This rug is amazing!! I have wood floors so it tends to move a bit with my dogs running around but easy to fix. They love laying on this rug because it’s soft. It looked like snow when we had the Christmas tree up. It’s so beautiful. My sister spilled on it the first week we had it and it wiped up clean. I will definitely repurchase for other rooms. I love the white which is not pure white silver but a still white. It’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: D & R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The rug is just as expected, purple is true to color, it is soft, and the price is right. I do not expect it to last more than a few years of foot traffic, but that is fine, given it is cheap. The edges turned up at first as it comes in a tight roll, but after turning it inside out a few hours and then a couples days of War and Peace and The Rise and Fall of the Third Reich sitting on its corners as heavy weights, and walking on it, it flattened out.
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Good Selection, Durable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Other then the fact his carpet is slightly larger then the 10x13 size I ordered (which was odd), it is working out perfectly. Unless you bend the carpet, you won't see any of the backing part, and even that part is pretty solid, and the ends look perfectly tapered off as well. There was a slight 'new carpet' odor for about 48 hours, which I actually liked, but nothing too strong. I would definitely recommend this carpet vendor to others and am thinking of ordering again for my living room since this first once was to replace really old carpet in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Trav Tedesco

customer_reviews.title: Actual Carpet sizes are much smaller than advertised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price the carpet is a good quality. The ends are finished and after a few vacuumings we have not seen any evidence of loose threads. It is much softer with a non slip pad underneath. The color was very close to the photo online. We bought three different sizes for our house. Be warned------all three carpet sizes were NOT as advertised!! All three were smaller by 6 inches on one side and up to 4 inches smaller on the other end. The tags on the carpet state they are the sizes we ordered, but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not 3 x 5 feet; larger than described.
customer_reviews.text: I know, it is a cheap shag rug so I shouldn't have expected too much but the real problem for me was that it is not "3 x 5 feet" it is actually 39.5 x 64 inches. I specifically needed a rug that was 36 x 60 inches so now this rug does not fit. So, do I go through the hassle of shipping back a rug that I can't use? Not sure yet, but pretty annoying to wait so long to find out it isn't properly described.
customer_reviews.author: Photographer AdvocateTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few of these shag rugs in different sizes the last couple of years, for my master bathroom, front foyer and playroom and they are wonderful! They add such coziness and are pretty easy to vacuum too. I bought a mohawk rug pad to make the rug extra soft underfoot. Spot cleaning is good and I use Folex spray for that. I bought this carpet in the Ivory and the color is a true ivory without having a yellow tinge. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi44

customer_reviews.title: Thick and very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I Was a little frightened by some of the reviews however I bought an 8 x 10 for my living room and I absolutely love it and so does my dog (as you can see). Super soft, thick pile, bottom seems heavy duty and the rug appears to be very well constructed. After I have had it awhile I’ll update but as of now I am very pleased with the purchase and price point.
customer_reviews.author: SydneyP

customer_reviews.title: Solo vs solid shag
customer_reviews.text: Someone else wrote a review that was fairly extensive. The negative reviews are all consistent, plastic smell, cheap, flimsy material. The positive ones are a strong contrast. In the other review, she said i'd your tag says solo shag, you get the lame one. If it's solid shag, it's the one everyone is pleased with. We got Solo. Returning, not rolling the dice again hoping to get the better one.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nearing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for girl's nursery!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my twin girl nursery. It is PERFECT!!! The lilac is a light purple. Not grape, not too pink, not grey, just a light purple. I don't know what else to say. I have not measured it, but it seems large enough, ESPECIALLY for the price. Yes, it is basically just a yarn rug, but that's what shag is. The binding around the edge is great, and I think it's even non-slip. For the price, and since it has free returns, why not order it and see for yourself?
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This rug is super cheap. It has an odor, which will probably go away eventually. The rug itself is not soft and you can see the backing of the rug right through the strands. It won't lay flat - even after placing heaving objects on it. And it isn't nonslip. It does have a plastic type backing but definitely slips around. Rather unsafe for a bathroom. I will return it, sadly I have to pay $9.98 in shipping charges. Ugh. My fault.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the turquoise rug.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6×9 shag rug in turquoise. I'm happy with my purchase. True to size and true to color as well. Not super soft but didn't really expect it to be. Does the job. Nice pile height to it. It rolled out flat and no chemical smell whatsoever. I will say that I hand fluffed it out and afterwards my hands had a clear residue on them but thats about it. Love the rug and would definitely purchase again! Highly recommend! Looked great after I hand fluffed it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug for my toddler's room to protect the brand new floor we put in. I wasn't too sure about it because it was so cheap, but I was pleasantly surprised. The color is spot-on with the listing image and matches the room nicely. It had a bit of a smell and a curl to the end of the rug that was rolled tightly, but I laid it out flat and both issues resolved themselves in a few days. The rug is easy to vacuum, does not shed and is pretty full for how cheap it was. Definitely recommend for a kid's room. I may even purchase the same rug in another color for our master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: allthatglittersisgold

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed by this rug, especially for the price! It’s soft but not too soft, has a nice pile to where my two year old loves laying on it. It unfolded really nicely with very minimal creases that went away within a few hours. There is rubber along the long sides so that was a nice touch I wasn’t expecting. It did have a little smell but that went away within an hour of it being unfolded. It came with instruction on how to care for it. I’m overall very very pleased with this purchase & have even referred my friends to purchase one. I will be ordering the runner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great rug for the price. I ordered the 8x11 in taupe. Its more of a grey then a taupe in my opinion. The rug is very light and the corners do not stay down very well because the backing is not heavy enough. It does the job though and the price is hard to beat. The pile is nice and long. The kids and dogs approve. If I was going to order it again I would get the "sandy brown" color instead.
customer_reviews.author: NotAMuggle

customer_reviews.title: Rough Rug
customer_reviews.text: Rug arrived compressed from being tightly rolled, and smelling of plastic/storage. Solved that issue easily by spraying it with vodka (to eliminate smell) and running a wide tooth comb through it. Fluffed up nicely. However, the positives end there. While the rug might look nice and fluffy, the synthetic materials used to make it are extremely rough and scratchy. Regular carpet feels much softer and more comfortable. Might be okay if you intend to use this exclusively to walk on, but I wanted to use it to make a comfortable floor lounge area. Also it's not actually 4'x6', it's a few inches larger on each side. Which means it doesn't fit in the area I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Piffle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect red . Not too bright , not to dark, absolutely beautiful! I have frieze carpet, sort of like shag, but twisted not loop. This was exactly the same! Thick, soft and very elegant. When I vacuumed it for the first time, hardly any carpet was in the canister. It fluffed up right away and lays flat almost immediately . It has a good weight to it as well. I’m so glad because I didn’t want the hassle of sending it back. If your thinking about it. This is it. Get it. And respond when you do. And it came in two days!
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles Will not come out
customer_reviews.text: I gave these rugs 4 stars instead of 5 because I’ve tried everything I know to get the wrinkles out. I’ve rolled them the opposite way, sat heavy objects on them and just let them be to see if the wrinkles would come out with time. After more than a month, they have not. It seems like the binding is too tight on one side and these wrinkles are gathered as a result. Not sure if this is a one time problem and I was the lucky recipient and of course I’ve waited too long to send them back. The wrinkles are only on one side . Suggestions anyone? The rugs are soft and pretty otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this has such good reviews. It legit feels like plastic. It arrived folded in half so I can only imagine how horrible it would be to get it to settle in place. I didn't even take it out of the plastic it was wrapped in. I opened one end to see how it felt and it was just gross. The thought of walking around barefoot on this rug made me cringe. I was very disappointed because the price was great for the size but I've purchased better and cheaper rugs from Ocean State Job Lot so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: emily

product_meta.title: Unique Loom Solo Solid Shag Collection Modern Plush Cherry Red Area Rug (4' 0 x 6' 0)
product_meta.description: Size:4' 0 x 6' 0| Color:Cherry RedOur Solo Solid Shag Collection features luxurious shag rugs in 22 (count ‘em!) gorgeous colors. Lush and soft, you’ll fall in love with this amazing rug. Imagine sinking your bare feet into the lavish pile of this extravagant rug! You’ll be the envy of everyone who visits your home with the magnificent color from your Solo Solid Shag rug. All machine made rugs (made with polypropylene) will usually have some degree of smell which is simply an off-gassing which is caused by the polypropylene pile. This material is extracted from propylene gas.The odor will subside naturally in an open ventilated area so in cases of a strong smell, we advise to leave it outdoors on a sunny day which will allow for the odors to maximize aeration which should then neutralize. For heavier cases, adding baking soda while outdoors will be helpful to expedite this process.
feature_bullets: This rug is perfect for those high traffic areas in your home. It's also kid and pet friendly!
This rug is water resistant, mold and mildew resistant, stain resistant, and does not shed.

Cleaning Instructions: We recommend spot cleaning with resolve, and regular vacuuming is good, but you can't use the beater bar (spinning brush) on the vacuum. It needs to be suction-only or take it outside and shake it out. You can use a carpet cleaner (shampooer) but it should be dried immediately and evenly.
Colors found in this rug include: Cherry Red.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars15,595 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Easy-to-clean stain resistant and does not shed
